roleset.name: to drink in small quantities
roleset.note: SIP-V NOTES: Member of Vncls chew-39.2-2. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sip.01-v)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: He sipped tea sweetened with honey from his high-backed leather chair at his bench , while scribbling notes ordering spectators to stop whispering or to take off their hats in his courtroom .
example.arg: from his high-backed leather chair at his bench
while scribbling notes ordering spectators to stop whispering or to take off their hats in his courtroom

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: As Helen Boehm , who owns an art porcelain company , sipped her luncheon cocktail , she reeled off the names of a few pals -- Prince Charles , Princess Diana , Sarah Ferguson , John Kluge , Milton Petrie .
example.arg: Helen Boehm , who owns an art porcelain company ,
